mainText:
Dear steve
Your soul will be always with us , inspiring us , telling us that life is a
great and wide space for everyone to show innovation .
Your life of glory tell us that everyone can make exception .
You leave a great great heritage and a name written by gold .
Im asking god to send you to heaven because people like you make difference
in the world
I will always when using my iphone remenbering that your ideas make my life
and other lifes easier .
author: Zakaria
